CutSceneText.Text: Well...they killed Hellion and survived, if that tells you anything.
All the Judges who went to Ataxiar are dead. Vanished.
Yes. Or so I believe, at any rate.
Yes. It's too soon to be sure, but yes.
I can't make my move until I know exactly what He is after...
Marchutan succeeded in driving Tiamat into a corner,
but then Empyrean Lord Kaisinel got involved.
That troublemaker finally joined the fray....
Still, it is Marchutan, and he's not likely to go down without a fight, either.
Prepare to send reinforcements, just in case.
